page.title: 16RIVER RAVENSBOURNE
page.content: The River Ravensbourne runs through Haynes Park. It is quite polluted because nobody ever cleans it out. There are no fish in the river. In the spring, however, you do get lots of frog and toad spawn. People throw in lots of rubbish. In the summer lots of long grass falls in when the golf course is cut. Lots of children have gone to paddle in the water and cut their feet on glass. We did a survey to see how many people thought the stream was dangerous. Lots of people thought it was not very safe. In fact eighty-seven people out of a hundred said it was dangerous. We also asked if they thought it was clean enough. We had a terrific response. Sixty-six people said that it was polluted and thirty-four said that it was safe.
